banner.title: Who We Are
banner.description: We have our roots in escape rooms and can look back on decades of experience in software development.

banner.title: Functions & Features
banner.description: A booking solution alone is not enough to cope with the stressful everyday life of leisure and business

_1.title: Personnel & Accounting
_1.description: Employee management and automated accounting - all in one place.

_2.title: Marketing & Campaigns
_2.description: Create campaigns and email marketing with just a few clicks.

_3.title: Image Editing
_3.description: Edit images and send them automatically - quickly and easily.

_4.title: Customer Relationship Management - All in one
_4.description: Manage your customer relationships and optimize all processes in a single tool. With Quinbook, you have everything under control!

_1.title: Experience Management
_1.description: The daily business routine stirs up countless troubles and questions:
_1.f_2: Was something special agreed with the customer?
_1.f_3: Has the team photo already been sent?
_1.f_4: Is something broken in the room?

_2.title: Digital Booking System
_2.f_1: Never double-book or forget to follow up on reservations again.
_2.f_2: Automatic voucher dispatch included - with YOUR individual graphics.
_2.f_3: Statistics that motivate you to drive your business forward.
_2.f_4: Individual email, campaign, and marketing management.
_2.f_5: No security retention with our external payment providers.

_3.title: Personnel Management
_3.description: No more external shift planners, email distributors, or Excel sheets: Employee coordination has never been so easy:
_3.f_1: Shift planning with vacation and sick leave notifications as well as swap function.
_3.f_3: Digital time tracking including breaks and matching to shifts.
_3.f_4: Internal communication made easy through our task management and news blog.
_3.f_5: Tracking: Which slot was created by whom and who managed which group?

_4.title: QuinGames
_4.description: Not just an editor, but an entire engine to easily create complete digital, browser-based point & click adventures without development knowledge:
_4.f_2: Engine with which customers can start & play the entire game directly on your website.
_4.f_3: Purchase processing directly and automatically integrated into Quinbook. Optionally, for a small fee (from 49 euros per month), also possible with other booking providers.

_5.title: QuinTours
_5.f_1: Editor & engine for outdoor games, scavenger hunts, and tours.
_5.f_2: Something big is coming here! Coming soon!
